name: tags(in:scheme:options:tokenRanges:)
desc: Returns an array of linguistic tags and token ranges for a given string range.
declaration:
func tags(in range: NSRange, 
   scheme tagScheme: String, 
  options opts: NSLinguisticTagger.Options = [], 
tokenRanges: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSArray?>?) -> [String]
